input.sentences: this is a summer home where a couple comes to enjoy their summer .
they take walks along the beach .
the scenery is amazing and a sight to see .
there is a lot to do at the beach home | like kayaking .

output.sentences: In the summer I went home to enjoy the beach.
I went on walks along the beach.
The sights and scenery were amazing.
There was a lot of kayaking before I went home.
The town sits around a lot of water.
